titles.title: Congratulating Jimmy Haywood and Kenny Roy for setting world records in civil aviation history and commending youth aviation programs that encourage young minorities to enter the field of civil aviation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: 10/8/2004--Introduced. Congratulates Jimmy Haywood and Kenny Roy for setting world records in civil aviation history. Commends the Aerosquad After School Program at Tomorrow's Aeronautical Museum in Compton, California, as well as other youth aviation programs that encourage young minorities to enter the field of civil aviation.
